channel.title: Changing the Anti Spammer?
channel.description:
Ok so me and my 2 friends run this server but were all room mates and when the server is on only 2 of us can log in at a time because of the anti spammer thing. Any help?
And on the client we can't remove the flames because the method58(whatever) doesn't even exist in there
Let me know if you can help

item.title: Changing the Anti Spammer?
item.dc:creator: @x_vain_x x vain x
item.description:
@x_vain_x wrote:

Well do you mean the antisyi, its a null and to get rid of the person who is doing it if it is would be to go into the character files of the person spamming and take the ip and put it in the ip ban file.

Read full topic
